response.explain: The previous action code has successfully executed the first subtask, which is to take the meat out of the fridge. The meat is now in the robot's inventory. The next step is to heat the meat.
response.subtask:
(1) Take the meat out of the fridge
(2) Heat the meat
(3) Put the heated meat on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Heat the meat
    oven = registry(env,"oven_wuinhm_0")
    MoveBot(env, robot, oven, camera)
    donothing(env)
    put_inside(robot, pork_chop, oven)
    donothing(env)
    toggle_on(robot, oven)
    donothing(env)
